Joined Team {{member.name}}
Joined Team {{member.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { headerList } from 'src/app/interfaces/interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-organizational-account', templateUrl: './organizational-account.component.html', styleUrls: ['./organizational-account.component.scss'] }) export class OrganizationalAccountComponent { data:headerList[]=[ { id : 1, isSelected : true, label : 'Joined' }, { id : 2, isSelected : false, label : 'Suggestions' } ]; selectedid:number = 1; getSelectedOne(item:headerList){ console.log(item.label); this.selectedid = item.id; } joinedList = [ {id: 1, name: 'Anusha'}, {id: 2, name: 'madhuri'} ]; suggestionList = [ {id: 3, name: 'sindhu'}, {id: 4, name: 'priya'} ] deleteClicked(id:number){ this.suggestionList.push() this.joinedList.splice(id,1); } }
